text: As for the birds,11:13. The identification of the specific birds in the list that follows is uncertain. However, it primarily refers to birds of prey and other birds that eat carrion or unclean animals. In addition the word translated “birds” really means “flying creatures,” which accounts for the inclusion of bats at the end of the list. these must not be eaten because they are repulsive: eagle, griffon vulture, bearded vulture,
